snippet: The members of the Bronx High School of Science track team, accused of holding another boy down and striking his genitals, sat quietly as the judge addressed them.
abstract: Three members of Bronx High School of Science track team face judge in hazing case; are accused of holding another boy down and striking his genitals.
lead_paragraph: The members of the Bronx High School of Science track team, accused of holding another boy down and striking his genitals, sat quietly as the judge addressed them.

headline.seo: Students in Bronx Science Hazing Case Make Court Appearance
headline.main: Students in Hazing Case Make Court Appearance
headline.print_headline: Three Bronx Students Accused of Hazing Go Before a Judge
